attributes.action: Make it illegal for photographs of children to be taken without parental consent
attributes.additional_details: The govenment needs to make it illegal for these groups of predators to take photos of our children and allowing them to distribute them in this way. The police need to be given the power to force the deletion of photos of children when a report has been made by the public.
attributes.background: Our government is not protecting our children enough from paedofiles. Is is totally legal for paedophiles to scout out children playing in parks and on beaches, and take photographs of them. These images can then be distributed and modified for their sexual gratification. This needs to stop!
